U.S. 
Department of .1 ustice 
United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
The Silvio J. Motto Buildin 
New Or'. OW or 
November 10, 2020 
Legal Counsel 
Federal Bureau of Prisons 
Re: United States v.  Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Dear 
Enclosed is a  laptop for Ghislaine Maxwell, an inmate at the Metropolitan Detention 
Center. We are providing this laptop to Ms. Maxwell for the sole purpose of reviewing discovery 
materials in connection with the above-captioned case. The laptop has been reviewed by support 
staff at our Office, who have informed us that they have successfully modified the laptop to meet 
the specifications you have requested. In particular, we have been informed that: 
• The laptop contains a microphone and camera, which have both been disabled. As a result, 
the laptop has no recording capabilities. 
• The laptop does not contain any programs for games. 
• Communication capabilities have been disabled. In particular, the laptop has no Wi-Fi, 
Bluetooth, or Ethernet connection capabilities. 
Respectfully submitted, 
AUDREY 
STRAUSS 
Acting United States Attorney 
-- - 
By: 
Assistant United States Attorneys 
Southern District of New York 
Tel: 
EFTA00019212
